choices: He tests it on his family
He tests it on his girlfriend's family
He tests it on his friends (add characters)
he tests it on a random stranger
1.content:
John wasn't very sure how he came to own such a powerful device.Heck! He wasn't even sure if it worked.Deciding that it had to be tested out, he decided to find a guinea pig..

Looking around, he noticed his sister in her room, lying on her bed listening to music. Deciding that it would be a perfect opportunity, he aimed the device at her and pushed the button. Time froze and he decided to swap clothes with her. After deciding that it would only be a change between both of them and that only he would notice any changes, time resumed with John finding himself wearing a flower dress with a training bra and matching panties. He was shocked to find that his sister was wearing his shirt and boxers. What shocked him the most was that all the clothing has been re-sized to fit them.

Quickly reversing the swap, he decided to test the device even more.....
1.title: What happens?

choices: His parents (he swaps them with each other).
His siblings (he swaps Jake and Cindy).
11.content:
(P.S. You said Cindy was six? Why does she need a training bra?)
Who does John test the device on?
11.title: He tests it on his family

1153.content: Who does he test it on?
1153.title: Other

choices: He decides to stay like this
12.content:
Deciding that his girlfriend would be a perfect candidate for swapping, he decides to test it on her. Activating the device and deciding to trade love for shopping for his love for gaming and that only he would notice, time resumed.
Immediately, he noticed that many things changed. His girlfriend's room had much lesser clothing that it used to have and she dressed less classy, wearing jeans and hoodies. Also, many gaming devices were strewn across the room.
He noticed that he was wearing a mush more classy shirt and tie and that he was more neatly dressed than usual. He tried to recall what he knew about Black Ops but t did nothing for him. The only thing he could remember were fashion magazines, for both males and females...
12.title: He tests it on his girlfriend's family

choices: Test it on the rest of Carol's family.
121.content:
He decided to reverse the swap and instantly Carol's room turned back to normal and she was wearing her expensive red dress again.
What does he do now?
121.title: He reverses the swap

122.content: Since you now love shopping, you can't bring yourself to reverse the switch. So, you decide to try another switch. But which one?
122.title: He decides to stay like this

choices: Went home and swapped names with his sister, Cindy
Swapped named with Carol's sister, Sally
1221.content:
When time resumed, he look down to see Carol's perky breasts resting on his chest. He then notice the hair lying on his shoulders and to make sure it was a complete switch, he looked in the closest mirror and saw Carol's smiling face.

"Hello?" He said in Carol's angellic voice.

"Oh, hey John. You want something?" His former body asked as he walked in.

"Just to say hi. I was walking by your house when I suddenly needed to use the restroom. So I asked your mom and she let me in." He responded just before Carol plants a quick kiss on his lips.

"Well I was just about to go get a new video-game. You wanna come?" Carol asked.

"No thanks. I have my own shopping to do." John said as he activated the GAS machine.

He had noticed right away that Carol was still in her normal clothes from before they switched bodies and he was too. So first he switched their clothes. Then he...
1221.title: Switch bodies with Carol

12211.content:
John decided that it would be weird being in Carol's body and having his own name, so he decided to turn the life-swap switch but only a little bit of the way, so that all was affected was that Carol would be called by John's name and he'd be called by her name.
What does John (who's now essentially Carol now that he's taken her name, body and passion for shopping) do now?
12211.title: Swapped names with Carol

choices: Jake or the parents show up.
12212.content:
So John walked off, still with Carol's body and love of shopping.

He arrived at home, where he met Cindy.
"Carol?" she said.
(John had made it so that only he would notice the personality swap, but didn't do anything about the body swap).
"No," said John, "Cindy."
With that, he made it so that he and Cindy swapped names.

What happens, now that John has Carol's body and Cindy's name and likes shopping, Carol has John's body and likes video games, and Cindy has John's name?
12212.title: Went home and swapped names with his sister, Cindy

12213.content:
He then decided to swap names with Carol's older sister Sally, so that people would call her "John" and him "Sally".
What does he do, with Carol's body and shopping interests but Sally's name?
12213.title: Swapped named with Carol's sister, Sally

choices: Yes-now John's a girl and Carol's a boy.
No, it does something else instead.
No, it does nothing at all.
1222.content: John decided to switch genders with Carol, but it doesn't say anything in the instructions about switching genders, so does it work?
1222.title: Switch genders with Carol

1223.content: Who does John decide to switch with now that his girlfriend is a gaming nerd and he's a fashion enthusiast?
1223.title: Switch with somebody else

13.content: He went with his Best Friend's Family but which one?
13.title: He tests it on his friends (add characters)

choices: One of his sisters (Britt or Emma).
131.content:
John decided to go to his best friend Adam's house and test the device there.

He walked two blocks and arrived at the house.

Adam was on the front porch, having invited his girlfriend Sarah over, and he and Sarah were standing on the porch, flirting.
Adam was wearing a white tee and shredded blue jeans and he had black hair and a tan. Sarah, on the other hand, was pale and blonde. She was about average size, while Adam was quite tall and skinny. Sarah was wearing a pink T-shirt and a blue denim skirt.

Britt, Adam's 19-year-old sister, was propped up against an oak tree, drinking raspberry lemonade and texting. She had a black ponytail and was wearing a purple sweater and blue sweatpants. She was tall, with an average build.

Sandra, Adam's mother, was mowing the lawn. She was wearing black jeans and a blue shirt and had brown hair in a bun, and she was short and thin.

Justin, Adam's father, who was both tall and wide and had black hair, was sitting on a deckchair on the porch, reading.

And Emma, Adam's other sister, who was only eight and was dumpy, with brown pigtails and a green dress, was sitting on the porch too, playing with her toy trucks.

He decided to use the device on Adam, but who does he swap Adam with?
131.title: Adam (the friend)

13511.content:
You suddenly find yourself in Emma's room, it worked! You looked at your small, pudgy hands, they were so fat! You were also way smaller, you didn't realise how small your sister was until now, it was so hard to reach for stuff up high and you couldn't run fast, you had to fight with the desire to skip.

Even though it would be fun to be a small, careless child again. You kind of want your grown up body back.

info.brief_description: A teenage boy comes to gain a strange device...
info.description:
One day, a teenage boy discovers a strange object that gives him something called a Gender Aspect Swap Device, or GAS for short. This device lets him exchange certain things with other people and can alter reality so that only he are aware.

Types of switches:
Body- Bodies are swapped between the male and the female. Clothing is not changed and those swapped will still think that they are still themselves
Life - The lives of one male and female would be swapped. Every aspect of their lives are swapped and they would act like they are their new bodies.
Clothes - Swaps the clothing of one male and one female.
Personality - Personalities are swapped between one male and one female and they would subconsciously act that way.
Personal information - Any aspect that can be swapped such as Work/School or names can be swapped between a male and a female.

The swaps can be altered so that it affects the whole world or just the two people.
Also, it can be decided by the owner of the GAS whether the changes made will be noticed.
When the GAS is used, time freezes and only those who possess a GAS will be able to move (plot hint?)
It only works on humans and has to happen between a male and a female.
Reality will adjust to fit the new reality, even if the changes are noticed.
Glitches can occur and it will not be noticed by anyone but the memory of the owner will not be affected as much.

Main characters:
John Williams - 16 years old, owner of GAS

Others:
Caroline Williams - John's mother
Jack Williams - John's Father
Cindy Williams - 6 years old , John's sister
Jake Williams - 21 years old, John's brother

Carol Danvers - 16 years old, John's girlfriend
Jane Danvers - Carol's mother
Jim Danvers - Carol's father
Tim Danvers - 7 years old , Carol's brother
Sally Danvers - 19 years old, Carol's sister

Feel free to add characters!
